output_list.criticism: The createRoom function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for the entryPrice parameter, which can lead to a loss of funds for the contract owner.

The enter function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for the msg.value parameter, which can lead to a loss of funds for the contract owner.

The enterWithReferral function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for the msg.value parameter, which can lead to a loss of funds for the contract owner.

The distributeFunds function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for the _deadSeat parameter, which can lead to a loss of funds for the contract owner.

The refundPlayersInRoom function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for the _roomId parameter, which can lead to a loss of funds for the contract owner.

The random function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for the block.timestamp and block.difficulty parameters, which can lead to a loss of funds for the contract owner.

The getRoom function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for the _roomId parameter, which can lead to a loss of funds for the contract owner.
The payout function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for the _to parameter, which can lead to a loss of funds for the contract owner.

The setCTO function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for the _newCTO parameter, which can lead to a loss of funds for the contract owner.

The setCEO function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. An attacker can set an arbitrary value for the _newCEO parameter, which can lead to a loss of funds for the contract owner.
